name: hibernating
desc: Last purchase was long back and low number of orders. May be lost.
action: Recreate brand value. Offer relevant products and good offers

name: at_Risk
desc: Some time since the've purchased. Need to bring them back!
action: Send personalised email or other messages to reconnect. Provide good offers and share valuable resources

name: cant_loose
desc: Used to purchase frequently but haven't returned for a long time.
action: Win them back. Talk to them. Make them special offers. Make them feel valuable.

name: about_to_sleep
desc: Below average recency and frequency. Will lose them if not reactivated.
action: Send personalised email or other messages to reconnect. Provide good offers and share valuable resources.

name: need_attention
desc: Above average recency, frequency and monetary values. May not have bought very recently though.
action: Reactivate them. Provide limited time offers. Recommend new products based on purchase history.

name: loyal_customers
desc: Buy on a regular basis. Responsive to promotions.
action: Up-sell higher value products. Engage them. Ask for reviews.

name: promising
desc: Recent shoppers, but haven't spent much
action: Create more brand awareness. Provide free trials.

name: new_customers
desc: Bought most recently, but not often.
action: provide a good onboarding process. Start building the relationship.

name: potential_loyalists
action: Recommend other products. Engage in loyalty programs.

name: champion
desc: Bought recently, buy often and spend the most
action: Reward them. They can become evangelists and early adopters of new products.
